text: Moonu Kodiyum Munnooru Pavanum is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Balu Kiriyath and starring Jagadish and Vinduja Menon in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/film_moonu-kodiyum-munnooru-pavanum-.htm ==Cast== * Jagadish as Gopalakrishnan Nair * Shammi Thilakan as Mathew Chullikyal * Vinduja Menon as Sreedevi Kurup * Narendra Prasad as R.K Unnithan * Shaju as Shaju * Karthika Kannan as Rose Mary * C. I. Paul as Upendra Kurup * Mahesh as Ananthan Kurup * Kalabhavan Anzar as Rajappan Nair * Harishree Ashokan as Kondotty *Narayanankutty as Udumbu *A. C. Zainuddin as Current Suredran *Salim Kumar as Mattangery Mathen *Machan Varghese as Aliyas *Spadikam George as Lazer * Kalabhavan Santhosh as Oran * Biju Chalakkudy * Harisree Martin ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Moonu Kodiyum Munnooru Pavanum
